name: parallel-video-transcoder
description: Massively parallel video transcoding with look-ahead optimization for faster encoding
long_description:
# Parallel Video Transcoder

A high-performance video transcoding MCPB bundle that leverages parallel processing and intelligent look-ahead optimization to dramatically reduce transcoding time.

## Features

- **4-8x faster** transcoding on multi-core systems
- Intelligent keyframe-aligned segmentation
- Scene change detection with look-ahead analysis
- Complexity-based bitrate allocation
- HLS output format support
- Cross-platform (macOS, Windows, Linux)

## How It Works

1. Analyzes input video to identify keyframes and scene changes
2. Splits video into segments at keyframe boundaries
3. Processes segments in parallel across multiple workers
4. Uses look-ahead analysis to optimize encoding decisions
5. Reassembles segments into HLS playlist or MP4

## Performance

Expect 4-8x speedup compared to sequential FFmpeg transcoding, with minimal quality loss.

output_directory.description: Directory where transcoded videos will be saved

max_workers.title: Maximum Worker Processes
max_workers.description: Number of parallel encoding workers. Set to 0 to automatically use CPU core count.

lookahead_frames.description: Number of frames to analyze ahead for optimization. Higher values improve quality but increase memory usage.

enable_scene_detection.title: Enable Scene Detection
